description:
Behind the Course

If you are one of the thousands of concerned parents searching for a reliable internet safety for kids course and you want your children to have secure online presence from very early age, or if you want your kids to get to the preferred college and not to jeopardise their dream job in the future ... then this is the most important course you should take right now. Welcome to "Protect Kids Identity Online" course.

My name is David Cassar and I will talk you step-by-step through six essential lessons. I am an expert at helping kids create their own online money making empire. Even I didn't put two and two together until that day when one of my parent-students asked me if I've seen that new study. The New York University Polytechnic School of Engineering and NYU Shanghai recently released a study showing how parents' every day habits on popular social media sites are easily allowing online predators to find out who their child is, approximately how old they are, exactly where they live, how to reach out to their child...and even their schedule...in mere minutes. After reading it, I was so terrified that I dug deep into the statistics to find out what's really behind the smoke and mirrors, to identify how my students can keep their kids safe online.
title: Internet Safety For Kids
